title: Longing for My Mother
itunes:title: Longing for My Mother
description:
Good morning Steve, Shirley, Tommy, Carla. I'm a 20 year old student in Greensboro North Carolina. I'm 12 weeks pregnant and I'm really feeling lonely at this time. When I found out I was pregnant and told the father of the child he informed me that he wanted nothing to do with this baby.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning Steve, Shirley, Tommy, Carla. I'm a 20 year old student in Greensboro North Carolina. I'm 12 weeks pregnant and I'm really feeling lonely at this time. When I found out I was pregnant and told the father of the child he informed me that he wanted nothing to do with this baby.
